solution.text:
No. of Blue balls \(=_{k}_\)
No. of Green balls \(=_{l}_\)
Probability \(= \frac {No.\,of\,blue\,balls\,+\,No.\,of\,green\,balls}{Total\,balls}\)
\(=\frac {_{k}_+_{l}_}{_{j}_+_{k}_+_{l}_+_{m}_}\)
\(=\frac{_{{k+l}}_}{_{{j+k+l+m}}_}\)
\(=_{{Fraction(k+l,j+k+l+m)}}_\)

content.text: What is the probability of drawing either a blue or a green ball?
